background_authenticationDeadRelogin.message: Error during authentication. Please login again

background_authenticationDenied.message: Authentication denied by user. Without access to Reddit Inbound is pretty much useless. Please consider granting access for Inbound. If you prefer not to you can uninstall this extension.

background_authenticationFailedReddit.message: Authentication failed. Error reported by Reddit: $ERROR$

background_authenticationSuccessful.message: Authentication successfull! We are ready to rumble.

background_cantAccessFolder.message: Failed to prepare folder for sync. If you deleted it, please configure a new one in the settings.

background_notAuthorised.message: Inbound is currently not authorised to access Reddit. Please open the extension settings of Inbound and grant access.

background_promptConfiguration.message: Please access the addon settings und configure Inbound.

background_promptConfigurationSteps.message: Please configure Inbound. Start by granting access to your Reddit account and then choose an output folder.

background_specifyRoot.message: Please specify a root directory in the settings.

extension_description.message: Access your reddit saved links directly from your Firefox library

options_about.message: Inbound is an free and open project by µKöff and is available under the MIT license.

options_attribution.message: The following libraries and tools are used in or were used to create Inbound:

options_chooseFolder.message: Choose the parent folder of the folder to be created in which the bookmarks for Reddit will be created. This folder will be regularly emptied and therefore shouldn't be used for bookmarks not managed by Inbound.

options_choseNameForFolder_c.message: Choose a name for the folder:

options_folderNotDeleted.message: Please not that your currently chosen folder, if set, won't be deleted nor emptied after your change.

options_support.message: Do you have a question? Problem? Contribution or proposal? Then feel free to get in touch with the developers on GitHub.
